languages.text: {n}Толпа одобрительно кивает. Возбужденные шепоты сливаются в единую молитву о вашем здравии. Музыкант улыбается.{/n} "Для скромного слуги нет награды достойнее, чем одобрение госпо{mf|дина|жи}. Я постараюсь воодушевить музыкой как можно больше ваших подданных".

traits.locale_text: {n}Толпа одобрительно кивает. Возбужденные шепоты сливаются в единую молитву о вашем здравии. Музыкант робко улыбается. {/n} "Для скромного слуги нет награды достойнее, чем одобрение госпо{mf|дина|жи}. Я постараюсь воодушевить музыкой как можно больше ваших подданных".

languages.text: {n}The crowd nods in approval. The excited whispers merge into a single prayer for your health. The flute player smiles.{/n} "For a humble servant, there is no greater reward than his {mf|lord|lady}'s approval. I will try my best to inspire as many of your subjects with music as I can."
languages.original_text: {n}Толпа одобрительно кивает. Возбужденные шепоты сливаются в единую молитву о вашем здравии. Музыкант улыбается.{/n} "Для скромного слуги нет награды достойнее, чем одобрение госпо{mf|дина|жи}. Я постараюсь воодушевить музыкой как можно больше ваших подданных".

The flute player smiles.{/n} "For a humble servant, there is no greater reward than his {mf|lord|lady}'s approval. I will try my best to inspire as many of your subjects with music as I can."

languages.text: {n}Des hochements de tête approbateurs parcourent la foule. Les murmures animés se transforment en vœux de bonne santé et le flûtiste vous adresse un sourire.{/n} « Pour un humble serviteur comme moi, il n'est pas de meilleure récompense que l'approbation de {mf|son seigneur|sa seigneure}. Je ferai de mon mieux pour inspirer autant de vos sujets que possible à l'aide de ma musique. »
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd nods in approval. The excited whispers merge into a single prayer for your health. The flute player smiles.{/n} "For a humble servant, there is no greater reward than his {mf|lord|lady}'s approval. I will try my best to inspire as many of your subjects with music as I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}Des hochements de tête approbateurs parcourent la foule. Les murmures animés se transforment en vœux de bonne santé et le flûtiste vous adresse un sourire.{/n} « Pour un humble serviteur comme moi, il n'est pas de meilleure récompense que l'approbation de {mf|son seigneur|sa seigneure}. Je ferai de mon mieux pour inspirer autant de vos sujets que possible à l'aide de ma musique. »

languages.text: {n}La multitud asiente en señal de aprobación. El murmullo de excitación da paso a una plegaria recitada al unísono por tu salud. El flautista sonríe.{/n} «Para un humilde siervo, no existe mayor recompensa que la aprobación de su {mf|señor|señora}. Haré cuanto esté en mi mano por inspirar con la música a tantos de sus súbditos como me resulte posible».
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd nods in approval. The excited whispers merge into a single prayer for your health. The flute player smiles.{/n} "For a humble servant, there is no greater reward than his {mf|lord|lady}'s approval. I will try my best to inspire as many of your subjects with music as I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}La multitud asiente en señal de aprobación. El murmullo de excitación da paso a una plegaria recitada al unísono por tu salud. El flautista sonríe.{/n} «Para un humilde siervo, no existe mayor recompensa que la aprobación de su {mf|señor|señora}. Haré cuanto esté en mi mano por inspirar con la música a tantos de sus súbditos como me resulte posible».

languages.text: {n}群衆がうなずいた。興奮したささやきは、あなたの健康を祈るひとつの祈りへと融合する。フルート奏者が微笑んだ。{/n}「謙虚な下僕にとって、{mf|主|夫人}の承認ほど大きな報酬はありません。私はできる限り多くの臣民を音楽で鼓舞できるよう努力します」
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd nods in approval. The excited whispers merge into a single prayer for your health. The flute player smiles.{/n} "For a humble servant, there is no greater reward than his {mf|lord|lady}'s approval. I will try my best to inspire as many of your subjects with music as I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}群衆がうなずいた。興奮したささやきは、あなたの健康を祈るひとつの祈りへと融合する。フルート奏者が微笑んだ。{/n}「謙虚な下僕にとって、{mf|主|夫人}の承認ほど大きな報酬はありません。私はできる限り多くの臣民を音楽で鼓舞できるよう努力します」

languages.text: {n}人群中有人点头表示赞同，兴奋的低语声越来越响，逐渐变成了祈求你身体健康的祷告。吹笛人微笑着，开了口。{/n}“对谦卑的仆人而言，没有任何赏赐能比得上主人的认可。我会尽我所能，用我的音乐来激励您的臣民。”
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd nods in approval. The excited whispers merge into a single prayer for your health. The flute player smiles.{/n} "For a humble servant, there is no greater reward than his {mf|lord|lady}'s approval. I will try my best to inspire as many of your subjects with music as I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}人群中有人点头表示赞同，兴奋的低语声越来越响，逐渐变成了祈求你身体健康的祷告。吹笛人微笑着，开了口。{/n}“对谦卑的仆人而言，没有任何赏赐能比得上主人的认可。我会尽我所能，用我的音乐来激励您的臣民。”

languages.text: {n}Die Menge nickt anerkennend. Das aufgeregte Flüstern verschmilzt zu einem Gebet für deine Gesundheit. Der Flötenspieler lächelt.{/n} "Für einen bescheidenen Diener gibt es keinen größeren Lohn, als den Zuspruch {mf|des Lords|der Lady}. Ich werde mein Bestes tun, um möglichst viele Eurer Untertanen mit meiner Musik zu inspirieren."
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd nods in approval. The excited whispers merge into a single prayer for your health. The flute player smiles.{/n} "For a humble servant, there is no greater reward than his {mf|lord|lady}'s approval. I will try my best to inspire as many of your subjects with music as I can."

Der Flötenspieler lächelt.{/n} "Für einen bescheidenen Diener gibt es keinen größeren Lohn, als den Zuspruch {mf|des Lords|der Lady}. Ich werde mein Bestes tun, um möglichst viele Eurer Untertanen mit meiner Musik zu inspirieren."

languages.text: {n}Kalabalıktaki insanlar, onaylarcasına başlarını eğiyor. Heyecan dolu fısıltılar, birleşerek sağlığın için edilen tek bir duaya dönüşüyor. Flütçü gülümsüyor.{/n} "Mütevazı bir hizmetkâr için {mf|lordunun|leydisinin} onayından daha büyük bir ödül olamaz. Tebaanızdan mümkün olduğunca fazla kişiye müziğimle ilham vermek için elimden geleni yapacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd nods in approval. The excited whispers merge into a single prayer for your health. The flute player smiles.{/n} "For a humble servant, there is no greater reward than his {mf|lord|lady}'s approval. I will try my best to inspire as many of your subjects with music as I can."
